rows.label: bf10380100_0010
rows.name: Words can be a curse.

rows.label: bf10380100_0020
rows.name: It was that curse that kept him bound.

rows.label: bf10380100_0030
rows.name: What a miserable story, isn't it?

rows.label: bf10380100_0040
rows.name: This world is a terrible place!

rows.label: bf10380100_0050
rows.name: Don't forget that you are also part of that world.

rows.label: bf10380100_0060
rows.name: If you were not there, if Marveni were not there

rows.label: bf10380100_0070
rows.name:
Shin and Laura too would have gone down
different paths.

rows.label: bf10380100_0080
rows.name: Exactly! That's precisely it!

rows.label: bf10380100_0090
rows.name: You're not old for nothing, old man.

rows.label: bf10380100_0100
rows.name: I'm also a wretched being, ugly and beyond saving.

rows.label: bf10380100_0110
rows.name: ...So let's end this.

rows.label: bf10380100_0120
rows.name: Can't you feel it?

rows.label: bf10380100_0130
rows.name: [System:Ruby rt=Father's ]God's[/System:Ruby] sadness? His feelings?

rows.label: bf10380100_0140
rows.name: How could that possibly reach me?

rows.label: bf10380100_0150
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: bf10380100_0152
rows.name: Not my role.

rows.label: bf10380100_0160
rows.name: This man... He couldn't be...?

rows.label: bf10380100_0170
rows.name: Come at me, kid! Come at me, partner!

rows.label: bf10380100_0180
rows.name: With your whole body and soul.

rows.label: bf10380100_0190
rows.name: Show me everything!

rows.label: bf10380100_0200
rows.name: The strength of your will!

rows.label: bf10380100_0210
rows.name: The reason you exist in this world!
